[user-name]

User profile stuff...

This will be composed of tags to show the data that the administrator deems useful.
Users
All users are defined as children of this type. Any other content should never be assigned this type.
Automatic Users

Users who just do not register, but participate (i.e. post a comment) and include their email address, get added to the system. These users automatically get an account tagged as automatic. This means they never registered and can still do so at a later time. Such an account is otherwise used to let those users define their email preferences (i.e. never email me, email at most once a month, etc.)
New Users
Users who just registered are put in this list. They get moved to the full list once they confirmed their email address.
Change Password

When a user request a password change, this tag is added to his account (unless the account is "auto", "new", or "blocked"). This allows the log in process to force the user to go to ones profile and change the password.
Blocked Users

Users who get blocked for whatever reason are moved under this folder. Keeping these user accounts may be mandatory (i.e. user purchased something on your site) and it is useful to prevent users with that same email addresses from re-registering.
User Tags
Set of tags used to label users on your site. These tags are considered free form so additional tags can be created.
Spammer User
This user posted spam on my website.
Hacker User
This user tried to gain access or otherwise illegally tried to access my website.
Impolite User
User has been quite impolite and as marked as such.
Offise User
User is offensive when using our website (write profanity.)
